role_description: An Ansible role that installs the official LastPass CLI on Linux and macOS
role_description_full_overview: [LastPass CLI](https://github.com/lastpass/lastpass-cli) is a user-friendly command-line client for [LastPass](https://www.lastpass.com/). LastPass is a freemium password manager that stores encrypted passwords online. The standard version of LastPass comes with a web interface, but also includes plugins for various web browsers and apps for many smartphones. It also includes support for bookmarklets. It is similar to but not open-source like [Bitwarden](https://gitlab.com/megabyte-labs/ansible-roles/bw).
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs the official LastPass CLI on Linux and macOS.
